concept.description: Report files contained per component version.
concept.cypher: MATCH (component:Dashboard:Component)-[:HAS_VERSION]->(version:Dashboard:Version)-[:CONTAINS_FILE]->(file:File) RETURN component as Component, version as Version, file as File ORDER BY component.id, version.version, file.fileName

concept.description: Report capabilities provided by files of a component version.
concept.cypher: MATCH (component:Dashboard:Component)-[:HAS_VERSION]->(version:Dashboard:Version)-[:CONTAINS_FILE]->(file:File), (file)-[:PROVIDES_CAPABILITY]->(capability:Dashboard:Capability) RETURN component as Component, version as Version, file as File, capability as Capability ORDER BY component.id, version.version, capability.type, capability.value

concept.description: Report capabilities provided by component versions.
concept.cypher: MATCH (component:Dashboard:Component)-[:HAS_VERSION]->(version:Dashboard:Version)-[:CONTAINS_FILE]->(file:File), (file)-[:PROVIDES_CAPABILITY]->(capability:Dashboard:Capability) WITH component, version, capability, count(file) as count MERGE (version)-[providesCapability:PROVIDES_CAPABILITY]->(capability) SET providesCapability.count = count RETURN component as Component, version as Version, capability as Capability, count as Count ORDER BY component.id, version.version, capability.type, capability.value
